Properties.Description: Distance at which the prop starts to fade (<0 = subtract from fademaxdist).
Max fade distance at which the prop is visible (0 = don't fade out)

If you specify a fade in the worldspawn, or if the engine is running under low end/medium end/XBox360, then the engine will forcibly fade out props even if fademindist/fademaxdist isn't specified. This scale factor gives you some control over the fade. Using 0 here turns off the forcible fades. Numbers smaller than 1 cause the prop to fade out at further distances, and greater than 1 cause it to fade out at closer distances.
The name of this entity's parent in the movement hierarchy. Entities with parents move with their parent.
The name of the bone or attachment to attach to on the entity's parent in the movement hierarchy. Use !bonemerge to use bone-merge style attachment.
Offset in the local space of the parent model's attachment/bone to use in hierarchy. Not used if you are not using parent attachment.
Angular offset in the local space of the parent model's attachment/bone to use in hierarchy. Not used if you are not using parent attachment.
Scale in the local space of the parent model's attachment/bone to use in hierarchy. Not used if you are not using parent attachment.
Whether to respect the specified local offset when doing the initial hierarchical attachment to its parent.
Name(s) of script files that are executed after all entities have spawned.
The name that other entities refer to this entity by.

When the interactable prop spawns, it will start with its animation already completed by this amount. Change this value if you want the prop to start in the middle, end, or any other non-standard amount.
Fire event A when this amount is reached, -1 means disabled
Fire event B when this amount is reached, -1 means disabled
Fire event C when this amount is reached, -1 means disabled
Fire event D when this amount is reached, -1 means disabled
Fire event E when this amount is reached, -1 means disabled
Fire event F when this amount is reached, -1 means disabled
Don't fire a completion event again until the user moves at least this much beyond the completion value (and back).
Require this object as a hand attachment to interact.
Only allow the animation to proceed forward
Only allow the animation to proceed backward
Restrict the animation range forward this many cycles
Restrict the animation range backward this many cycles
Restrict the forward animation progress but not the overall range
Spawn in the locked state
Restrict the animation range this many cycles when locked
When the player releases the handle, return autonomously.
When the player releases the handle, return to this amount of completion autonomously.
Determines the threshold [0,1] for the Return to Completion value to be set to 0 or 1 automatically when the player releases the handle.

When using single controller mode, delay starting Return To Completion for a short period of time when the player releases the handle. ForcePlayerRelease overrides this setting and ReturnToCompletion will start normally.
Used when returning to the return-to-completion amount. If the animation had to return over its entire length, it'd take this long.
Sound to make when motion begins.
Sound to make while moving.
Player stops interacting with the prop
Sound for the open animation completing
Sound for the close animation completing
Sound to make when motion end transition begins
Sound to make when the player interacts with the handle while it is locked.

Properties.FriendlyName: Return to Completion Forward Move Sound
Properties.Description: Sound for movement during return to completion forward

Properties.FriendlyName: Return to Completion Backward Move Sound
Properties.Description: Sound for movement during return to completion backward
Name of the model interaction bone to match (substring search)

Properties.FriendlyName: Motion style when returning to completion amount

Properties.Description: Responds to Gravity gun pull
Retain some velocity from the player's hand
Move when hit by physics forces
Ignore the rotation (twisting) of the player's hand when interacting
Ignore the position (offset) of the player's hand when interacting
Fires haptic pulses on both hands when interacting.
Amount of Resistance on Anim Interactable movement (ie 1.0 full, 0.1 slow)
Sets the animation cycle of the children of the Anim Interactable entity
Remaps updates to the child models to be between 0 and 1 over the entire range of the interactable.
The animgraph parameter to update for the child model. Sets the animation cycle directly if none is specified.
Ignored by NPC movement
Create a navigation obstacle to assist NPC pathfinding
Forces Player to Stop Interacting if they take damage
On initial spawn, act like a prop_physics. Won't be usable as an anim interactable until it receives a 'StopBehavingLikePropPhysics' input.
Set to true if the animinteractable is static or has a small move bounds (doors, levers)
comma-separated list of interaction layers

InputOutputs.Name: Enable
InputOutputs.Description: Enable this entity.

InputOutputs.Name: Disable
InputOutputs.Description: Disable this entity.

InputOutputs.Name: SetParent
InputOutputs.Description: Changes the entity's parent in the movement hierarchy.

InputOutputs.Name: SetParentAttachment
InputOutputs.Description: Change this entity to attach to a specific attachment point on its parent. Entities must be parented before being sent this input. The parameter passed in should be the name of the attachment.

InputOutputs.Name: SetParentAttachmentMaintainOffset
InputOutputs.Description: Change this entity to attach to a specific attachment point on it's parent. Entities must be parented before being sent this input. The parameter passed in should be the name of the attachment. The entity will maintain it's position relative to the parent at the time it is attached.

InputOutputs.Name: ClearParent
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity from the the movement hierarchy, leaving it free to move independently.

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptFile
InputOutputs.Description: Load and execute a script file

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptCode
InputOutputs.Description: Execute a fragment of script code

InputOutputs.Name: CallScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Call a script function

InputOutputs.Name: CallPrivateScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function from this entity's private script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: CallGlobalScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function in the global script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: Kill
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillHierarchy
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity and all its children from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: AddOutput
InputOutputs.Description: Adds an entity I/O connection to this entity. Parameter format: outputname>targetname>inputname>parameter>delay>max times to fire (-1 == infinite). Very dangerous, use with care.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser1 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser2 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser3 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser4 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser1 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser2 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser3 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser4 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnKilled
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the entity is killed and removed from the game.

InputOutputs.Name: OnInteractStart
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the interaction is initiated

InputOutputs.Name: OnInteractStop
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the interaction is ended

InputOutputs.Name: OnGravityGunPull
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the prop is gravity pulled

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionA
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount A is reached or crossed

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionA_Forward
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount A is reached or crossed while animation is moving forward

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionA_Backward
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount A is reached or crossed while animation is moving backward

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionB
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount B is reached or crossed

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionB_Forward
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount B is reached or crossed while animation is moving forward

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionB_Backward
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount B is reached or crossed while animation is moving backward

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionC
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount C is reached or crossed

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionC_Forward
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount C is reached or crossed while animation is moving forward

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionC_Backward
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount C is reached or crossed while animation is moving backward

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionD
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount D is reached or crossed

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionD_Forward
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount D is reached or crossed while animation is moving forward

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionD_Backward
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount D is reached or crossed while animation is moving backward

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionE
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount E is reached or crossed

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionE_Forward
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount E is reached or crossed while animation is moving forward

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionE_Backward
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount E is reached or crossed while animation is moving backward

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionF
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount F is reached or crossed

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionF_Forward
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount F is reached or crossed while animation is moving forward

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionF_Backward
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount F is reached or crossed while animation is moving backward

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionExitA
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount A is Exited

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionExitB
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount B is Exited

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionExitC
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount C is Exited

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionExitD
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount D is Exited

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionExitE
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount E is Exited

InputOutputs.Name: OnCompletionExitF
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the completion amount F is Exited

InputOutputs.Name: Position
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the animation changes. Output is the amount of animation completed (between 0 and 1)

InputOutputs.Name: PositionInverted
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the animation changes. Output is the inverse of the amount of animation completed (between 1 and 0)

InputOutputs.Name: PositionRaw
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the animation changes. Output is the amount of animation completed (raw completion value)

InputOutputs.Name: Velocity
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the animation changes. Output is the delta in animation change since last tick (between -1 & 1)

InputOutputs.Name: PositionInitialLimitsRemap
InputOutputs.Description: Fired whenever the animation changes. Output is the amount of animation completed using the initial backward/forward limits (between 0 and 1)

InputOutputs.Name: SetCompletionValue
InputOutputs.Description: Sets the current completion value, without firing any events.

InputOutputs.Name: SetCompletionValueA
InputOutputs.Description: Sets the target completion value A amount (when event A will be fired). -1 means disabled.

InputOutputs.Name: SetCompletionValueB
InputOutputs.Description: Sets the target completion value B amount (when event B will be fired). -1 means disabled.

InputOutputs.Name: SetCompletionValueC
InputOutputs.Description: Sets the target completion value C amount (when event C will be fired). -1 means disabled.

InputOutputs.Name: SetCompletionValueD
InputOutputs.Description: Sets the target completion value D amount (when event D will be fired). -1 means disabled.

InputOutputs.Name: SetCompletionValueE
InputOutputs.Description: Sets the target completion value E amount (when event E will be fired). -1 means disabled.

InputOutputs.Name: SetCompletionValueF
InputOutputs.Description: Sets the target completion value F amount (when event F will be fired). -1 means disabled.

InputOutputs.Name: SetReturnToCompletionAmount
InputOutputs.Description: Sets a new ReturnToCompletionAmount.

InputOutputs.Name: EnableReturnToCompletion
InputOutputs.Description: Enable ReturnToCompletion

InputOutputs.Name: DisableReturnToCompletion
InputOutputs.Description: Disable ReturnToCompletion

InputOutputs.Name: EnableOnlyRunForward
InputOutputs.Description: Enable OnlyRunForward

InputOutputs.Name: DisableOnlyRunForward
InputOutputs.Description: Disable OnlyRunForward

InputOutputs.Name: SetAnimationDuration
InputOutputs.Description: Sets a new AnimationDuration.

InputOutputs.Name: PlayAnimation
InputOutputs.Description: Play an animation.

InputOutputs.Name: SetLimitForward
InputOutputs.Description: Sets a new LimitForward.

InputOutputs.Name: SetLimitBackward
InputOutputs.Description: Sets a new LimitBackward.

InputOutputs.Name: SetLimitStop
InputOutputs.Description: Sets a new LimitStop.

InputOutputs.Name: Lock
InputOutputs.Description: Locks the animinteractable.

InputOutputs.Name: Unlock
InputOutputs.Description: Unlocks the animinteractable.

InputOutputs.Name: TurnIntoPhysicsProp
InputOutputs.Description: Removes the animinteractable and replaces it with a physics prop of the same model.

InputOutputs.Name: SetPositiveResistance
InputOutputs.Description: Sets the amount of Resistance on Anim Interactable movement as a % of base movement (ie 1.0 full, 0.1 slow)

InputOutputs.Name: SetBodyGroup
InputOutputs.Description: Sets NPC bodygroup. Format is <BodygroupName,index>

InputOutputs.Name: ForcePlayerRelease
InputOutputs.Description: Forces the animinteractable to release the player's hand

InputOutputs.Name: SetReturnToCompletionStyle
InputOutputs.Description: Set the motion style when returning to completion amount. 0 (Ease-in, ease-out), 1 (Ease-in only), 2 (Ease-out only), 3 (Bounce), 4 (Lerp)

InputOutputs.Name: DisableInteraction
InputOutputs.Description: Disable Interaction (1 to disable - 0 to re-enable)

InputOutputs.Name: StopBehavingLikePropPhysics
InputOutputs.Description: Stop behaving like a prop_physics, and switch to being a normal prop_animinteractable

InputOutputs.Name: EnableChildModelUpdates
InputOutputs.Description: Enable updates to any child models of this anim interactable

InputOutputs.Name: DisableChildModelUpdates
InputOutputs.Description: Disable updates to any child models of this anim interactable

InputOutputs.Name: ForceImmediateReturnToCompletion
InputOutputs.Description: Sets a new AnimationDuration, forces the player to release the animinteractable, and forces an immediate return to completion with the Lerp style.
